content: welcome to the furls june cal with our host lorene eppolite of cre8tion crochet this month we are making these fun bathing suit cover-up shorts each new part will be added to the pattern link on the dates below tuesday 06/12/18- supply list and gauge info tuesday 06/19/18- part one tuesday 06/26/18- part two tuesday 07/03/18- final assembly and finishing this pattern comes in 6 sizes with two different fits available each size grouping will fit two sizes and depending on how you d like them to fit you can choose one of two sizes sizes will be xs-s s-m m-l l-1x 1x-2x and 2x-3x the larger size will provide a slightly looser fit and will provide more room in the rear the summer breeze shorts are constructed in four panels with the waistband added at the end along with an i-cord tie ps i totally cheat when i make my i-cord so it s much easier than what you may be used to
